statements: SELECT * FROM IoTDeviceData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT device_id, humidity FROM IoTDeviceData WHERE humidity < 60
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM IoTDeviceData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM IoTDeviceData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM IoTDeviceData ORDER BY humidity ASC, temperature DESC
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM IoTDeviceData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM IoTDeviceData GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY avg_temp DESC
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM IoTDeviceData WHERE humidity < 50 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM IoTDeviceData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY humidity DESC, device_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM IoTDeviceData WHERE temperature < 18 OR humidity > 70 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, last_reported_time FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY last_reported_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location_id FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Laptop' AND location_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT device_name FROM devices ORDER BY last_reported_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, location_id FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT device_id, device_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM devices JOIN sensor_data ON devices.device_id = sensor_data.device_id;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_id FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT device_id, device_name, installation_date FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location_id FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT device_name, location_id, installation_date FROM IoTDevices WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT control_id, target_temperature, fan_speed FROM HomeClimateControl ORDER BY control_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_Device WHERE status='active';
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM IoT_Device WHERE location='Lab';
SELECT * FROM Sensor_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM User WHERE is_admin=true;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_Device WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT data_id, sensor_type, timestamp, value FROM Sensor_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM User WHERE is_admin = true
SELECT control_id, target_temperature, control_mode FROM Climate_Control
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE status = True;
SELECT device_name, location, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT u.user_id, u.preferred_temperature, u.notification_settings, d.device_name FROM UserSettings u JOIN IoTDevices d ON u.device_id = d.device_id WHERE u.preferred_temperature > 25;
